title: Flatbread
description:
A round piece of flatbread with grill marks. Used to represent any type of flatbread, soft or crunchy.

Can be used to talk about corn-based flatbreads popular in Central and South America like arepa, gordita, or pupusa. Can also be used in reference to other flatbreads including naan, lavash, matzah, and pita.

Not to be confused with ðŸ¥™ Stuffed Flatbread.
